item.title: Merry Christmas! 2025 Retrospective
item.description:
Merry Christmas!

2025 Retrospective

What a year it has been! I got my second kid early this year and was plenty busy with child-rearing as my number one priority, but I somehow managed to put some stuff out. Let’s get through it.

The good

Blogging

28 posts in 2025. I managed to keep the blog alive, with around two new posts per month. I enjoy the process â€” it’s a nice outlet for venting and also sharing my projects. It even sometimes forced me to work on something new just to have something to write about!
